quote: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts. – Eleanor Roosevelt
fact: The original story from "Tales of 1001 Arabian Nights" begins, "Aladdin was a little Chinese boy."
joke: Some people say that comedians who tell one too many light bulb jokes soon burn out, but they don't know watt they are talking about. They're not that bright.
